  <script type="text/javascript">
    var cookieValue;
    var GPTPageview;
    var expireDate;

    pageviewCookieInit();

    function pageviewCookieInit(){
        cookieValue = getCookie('amu-pv');
        if(cookieValue.length < 1){
            expireDate = new Date();
            expireDate.setDate(expireDate.getDate() + 1);
            expireDate.toUTCString();
            GPTPageview = 1;
        } else {
            expireDate = getCookieField(cookieValue, 'expire');
            GPTPageview = parseInt(getCookieField(cookieValue, 'pv'), 10)+1;
        }

        setCookie('amu-pv', [['pv', GPTPageview]], expireDate);
    }

    function getCookie (name) {
        var cookieName = name + '=';
        var cookieArr = document.cookie.split(';');
        for(var i = 0; i < cookieArr.length; i++){
            var curCookie = cookieArr[i];
            while (curCookie.charAt(0)==' ') curCookie = curCookie.substring(1,curCookie.length);
            if(curCookie.indexOf(cookieName) == 0){
                return curCookie.substring(cookieName.length, curCookie.length);
            }
        }
        return "";
    }

    function getCookieField(cookie, field) {
        var fieldName = field + '+';
        var cookieArr = cookie.split('!');
        for(var i = 0; i < cookieArr.length; i++){
            var curCookie = cookieArr[i];
            while (curCookie.charAt(0)==' ') curCookie = curCookie.substring(1,curCookie.length);
            if(curCookie.indexOf(fieldName) == 0){
                return curCookie.substring(fieldName.length, curCookie.length);
            }
        }
        return "";
    }

    function setCookie (name, kvArr, expire) {
        var value = [];
        var i;
        for (i = 0; i < kvArr.length; i++){
            var fieldName = kvArr[i][0];
            var fieldValue = kvArr[i][1];
            value.push(fieldName + '+' + fieldValue);
        }
        value.push('expire' + '+' + expire);

        value = value.join('!');

        var cookie = [
            name + '=' + value,
            'expires=' + expire,
            'path=' + '/'
        ];

        document.cookie = cookie.join(';');

    }

</script>

    // PLace to store ad slots for refreshing
    var definedAdSlots = {};



    /* ********************************** */
    /*      Helper Functions for Ads      */
    /* ********************************** */

    var findBreakpoint = function(breakpointsArray) {
        var maxBpt, curBpt;
        for (var i = 0; i < breakpointsArray.length; i++) {
            curBpt = breakpointsArray[i];
            if (browserWidth >= curBpt.minWidth && browserHeight >= curBpt.minHeight){
                if(!maxBpt || (curBpt.minWidth >= maxBpt.minWidth && curBpt.minHeight >= maxBpt.minHeight)){
                    maxBpt = curBpt;
                }
            }
        }
        return maxBpt
    };

    // Interstitial Cookie Logic
    function startInterstitial() {
        var $pc = parseInt($.cookie('page_count'), 10);
        $pc >= 0 ? $pc++ : $pc = 0;
        $.cookie('page_count', $pc, {expires: 1, path: '/strip'});
        if($pc in objectConverter([3, 8, 13, 18, 23, 28, 33])) {
            $('.ad-interstitial').addClass('js-ad');
            interstitial = true;
        }
    }

    function refresh_tower_comments(){
        if(tower_comments_refresh_count < 2){
            // Start header-bidding auction
            startAuction(1000, $('#tower_comments'), [adSlotConfig['tower_comments'].slot]);
            // Refresh ad
            googletag.pubads().refresh([adSlotConfig['tower_comments'].slot]);
            tower_comments_refresh_count++;
        } else {
            clearInterval(tower_comments_interval);
        }
    }


    function findAds(startPoint, selector) {
        // Starting point
        var sp = document.querySelectorAll(startPoint);
        // Place to store ad slot divs
        var ads;

        // Find all ads after the starting point
        if(sp.length !== 0) {
            ads = $(sp).find(selector);
        } else {
            ads = document.querySelectorAll(selector);
        }

        // Filter out any ads that are hidden
        var visibleAds = ads.filter(":visible");

        return visibleAds;
    }


    function defineAds(adDivs) {
        var slots = [];
        var i, slotType, slot;
        for (i = 0; i < adDivs.length; i++) {
            // ID given to ad slot, usually ad type + index
            slotName = adDivs[i].id;

            // Slot type, stored in data-ad-type
            slotType = $(adDivs[i]).data('ad-type');

            // Define slot
            slot = googletag.defineSlot(adSlotPath, adSlotConfig[slotType].breakpoint.sizes, slotName).addService(googletag.pubads());

            // Set slot level targeting
            for (key in adSlotConfig[slotType].targeting) {
                slot.setTargeting(key, adSlotConfig[slotType].targeting[key]);
            }

            slots.push(slot);

            // Store slot for later use (refreshing ads, etc)
            adSlotConfig[slotType].slot = slot;

        }
        return slots;
    }


    function displayAds(adDivs) {
        var adDivsLength = adDivs.length;
        var slotName;

        if(adDivsLength === 0) {
            googletag.display();
        } else {
            for (var i = adDivsLength-1; i>=0; i--) {
                slotName = adDivs[i].id;
                googletag.display(slotName);
            }
        }

    }


    function refreshAds(adSlots) {
        for(var i = 0; i < adSlots.length; i++){
            adSlots[i].setTargeting('pv', GPTPageview);
        }

        if (adSlots.length === 0) {
            googletag.pubads().refresh();
        } else {
            googletag.pubads().refresh(adSlots);
        }
    }



    function startAuction(bidTimeout, adDivs, slots) {
        // Define bidders
        var bidders = ['a9', 'ix'];

        // create a requestManager to keep track of bidder state to determine when to send ad server
        // request and what apstagSlots to request from the ad server
        var requestManager = {
            adServerRequestSent: false
        };
        // add the bidders to the request manager:
        bidders.forEach(function(bidder) {
            requestManager[bidder] = false;
        });

        // return true if all bidders have returned
        function allBiddersDone() {
            return bidders.filter(function(bidder) {return requestManager[bidder];}).length === bidders.length;
        }

        // handler for header bidder responses
        function bidderDone(bidder) {
            if (requestManager.adServerRequestSent === false ) {
                // flip the boolean associated with the bidder in the request manager
                requestManager[bidder] = true;

                // if all bidders are back, send the request to the ad server
                if (allBiddersDone()) {
                    sendAdserverRequest(adDivs, slots);
                }
            }
        }

        // actually get ads from DFP
        function sendAdserverRequest(adDivs, slots) {
            if (requestManager.adServerRequestSent === false) {
                requestManager.adServerRequestSent = true;
                googletag.cmd.push(function() {
                    // Display ads
                    displayAds(adDivs);
                    // Refresh ads
                    refreshAds(slots);

                    if (adSlotConfig['tower_comments'].intervalSet === false && adSlotConfig['tower_comments'].slot) {
                        tower_comments_interval = setInterval(function () {refresh_tower_comments();}, 120000);
                        adSlotConfig['tower_comments'].intervalSet = true;
                    }
                });
            }
        }

        function requestBids(bidTimeout, adDivs, slots) {
            // fetch apstag bids, set bid targting, then call headerBidderBack
            // to get the ads for the first time
            // Fetch Amazon bids for slots on page
            amzn_fetchBids(adDivs, slots);

            // Fetch Index bids for slots on page
            ix_fetchBids(adDivs, slots);

        }

        /***** Amazon helper functions *****/

        function amzn_buildSlotsArray (adDivs) {
            var slotsArray = [];
            var i, slot, slotType;
            for(i = 0; i < adDivs.length; i++){
                slot = adDivs[i];
                slotType = $(slot).data('ad-type');
                slotsArray.push({
                    slotID: slot.id,
                    sizes: adSlotConfig[slotType].breakpoint.sizes
                });
            }
            return slotsArray;

        }

        function amzn_fetchBids (adDivs, slots) {
            // Fetch Amazon bids for slots on page
            apstag.fetchBids(
                {
                    slots: amzn_buildSlotsArray(adDivs),
                    timeout: 1000
                },
                function(bids) {
                    googletag.cmd.push(function(){
                        // Set Amazon bid key-values pairs
                        try {
                            apstag.setDisplayBids();
                        } catch(e) {
                            //do nothing
                        }
                    });
                    bidderDone('a9', adDivs, slots);
                }
            );
        }


        /***** Index helper functions *****/

        function ix_buildSlotsArray (slots) {
            var slotsArray = [];
            var i, slot;
            for(i = 0; i < slots.length; i++){
                slot = slots[i];
                slotsArray.push(
                    {
                        slot: slot
                    }
                );
            }
            return slotsArray;
        }

        function ix_fetchBids (adDivs, slots) {
            // Fetch Index bids for slots on page
            window.headertag.cmd.push(function() {
                googletag.cmd.push(function () {
                    window.headertag.retrieveAndSetDemand(
                        ix_buildSlotsArray(slots),
                        function () {
                            bidderDone('ix', adDivs, slots);
                        }
                    );
                });
            });
        }

        // ask bidders for their bids
        requestBids(bidTimeout, adDivs, slots);
        // set timeout to send request to call sendAdserverRequest() after timeout
        // it all bidders haven't returned before then
        window.setTimeout(function() {
            sendAdserverRequest(adDivs, slots);
        }, bidTimeout);
    }


    // Set all breakpoints
    adSlotConfig['leaderboard'].breakpoint = findBreakpoint(adSlotConfig['leaderboard'].breakpoints);
    adSlotConfig['banner'].breakpoint = findBreakpoint(adSlotConfig['banner'].breakpoints);
    adSlotConfig['rectangle'].breakpoint = findBreakpoint(adSlotConfig['rectangle'].breakpoints);
    adSlotConfig['rectangle_right'].breakpoint = findBreakpoint(adSlotConfig['rectangle_right'].breakpoints);
    adSlotConfig['tower_content'].breakpoint = findBreakpoint(adSlotConfig['tower_content'].breakpoints);
    adSlotConfig['tower_comments'].breakpoint = findBreakpoint(adSlotConfig['tower_comments'].breakpoints);
    adSlotConfig['tower_anchored'].breakpoint = findBreakpoint(adSlotConfig['tower_anchored'].breakpoints);
    adSlotConfig['interstitial'].breakpoint = findBreakpoint(adSlotConfig['interstitial'].breakpoints);
    adSlotConfig['tynt'].breakpoint = findBreakpoint(adSlotConfig['tynt'].breakpoints);




    /* *************************** */
    /*      Initial Page Load      */
    /* *************************** */
    $(document).ready(function() {
        // Limit the number of time the 33Across units is served
        if (browserWidth > 728 && GPTPageview < 8) {
            $('#tynt').addClass('js-ad');
        }

        googletag.cmd.push(function () {
            var curAdDivs = findAds('html', '.js-ad');
            var curSlots = defineAds(curAdDivs);

            // Enable services on googletag
            googletag.pubads().disableInitialLoad();
            googletag.enableServices();

            // Start header-bidding auction
            startAuction(1000, curAdDivs, curSlots);

            if($('.js-ad-lazy-load').length > 0){
                var offset = -200;
                inView.offset(offset);

                // Find all lazy load ads
                var lazyAdDivs = findAds('html', '.js-ad-lazy-load');
                var lazyAdSlots, curAd, i;
                for(i = 0; i < lazyAdDivs.length; i++) {
                    curAd = lazyAdDivs[i];

                    inView('#' + curAd.id)
                        .once('enter', function (element) {
                            // Define the ads
                            lazyAdSlots = defineAds([element]);
                            googletag.pubads().disableInitialLoad();
                            googletag.enableServices();
                            startAuction(1000, [element], lazyAdSlots);
                        });
                }
            }
        });
    });

      <script>
  // Global variable for advertising config
  var gocomics_ads = gocomics_ads || {};

  // Set ad channel
  gocomics_ads.adChannel = 'a';


  gocomics_ads.getCookie = function (name) {
      var cookieName = name + '=';
      var cookieArr = document.cookie.split(';');
      for(var i = 0; i < cookieArr.length; i++){
          var curCookie = cookieArr[i];
          while (curCookie.charAt(0)==' ') curCookie = curCookie.substring(1,curCookie.length);
          if(curCookie.indexOf(cookieName) == 0){
              return curCookie.substring(cookieName.length, curCookie.length);
          }
      }
      return "";
  };

  gocomics_ads.getCookieField = function (cookie, field) {
      var fieldName = field + '+';
      var cookieArr = cookie.split('!');
      for(var i = 0; i < cookieArr.length; i++){
          var curCookie = cookieArr[i];
          while (curCookie.charAt(0)==' ') curCookie = curCookie.substring(1,curCookie.length);
          if(curCookie.indexOf(fieldName) == 0){
              return curCookie.substring(fieldName.length, curCookie.length);
          }
      }
      return "";
  };

  gocomics_ads.setCookie = function (name, kvArr, expire) {
      var value = [];
      var i;
      for (i = 0; i < kvArr.length; i++){
          var fieldName = kvArr[i][0];
          var fieldValue = kvArr[i][1];
          value.push(fieldName + '+' + fieldValue);
      }
      value.push('expire' + '+' + expire);

      value = value.join('!');

      var cookie = [
          name + '=' + value,
          'expires=' + expire,
          'path=' + '/'
      ];

      document.cookie = cookie.join(';');

  };

  //Advertising pageview cookie
  gocomics_ads.setPageviewCookie = function () {
      var cookieValuePV = gocomics_ads.getCookie('amu-pv');
      var GPTPageview, expireDatePV;

      if(cookieValuePV.length < 1){
          expireDatePV = new Date();
          expireDatePV.setDate(expireDatePV.getDate() + 1);
          expireDatePV.toUTCString();
          GPTPageview = 1;
      } else {
          expireDatePV = gocomics_ads.getCookieField(cookieValuePV, 'expire');
          GPTPageview = parseInt(gocomics_ads.getCookieField(cookieValuePV, 'pv'), 10)+1;
      }

      gocomics_ads.setCookie('amu-pv', [['pv', GPTPageview]], expireDatePV);
      return GPTPageview;
  };


  //Advertising A/B test cookie
  gocomics_ads.setChannelCookie = function () {
      var cookieValueAB = gocomics_ads.getCookie('amu-ab');
      var GPTChannelAB, expireDateAB, channelNumber;

      if(cookieValueAB.length < 1){
          expireDateAB = new Date();
          expireDateAB.setDate(expireDateAB.getDate() + 1);
          expireDateAB.toUTCString();
          channelNumber = Math.floor(Math.random() * 100) + 1;
          if(channelNumber > 20){
              GPTChannelAB = 'a';
          } else {
              GPTChannelAB = 'b';
          }
          gocomics_ads.setCookie('amu-ab', [['channel', GPTChannelAB]], expireDateAB);
      } else {
          GPTChannelAB = gocomics_ads.getCookieField(cookieValueAB, 'channel');
      }
      return GPTChannelAB;
  };

  gocomics_ads.updatePageview = function () {
      gocomics_ads.adPageview = gocomics_ads.setPageviewCookie();
      Object.keys(gocomics_ads.adSlotConfig).forEach(function(key) {
          console.log(gocomics_ads.adSlotConfig[key]);
          gocomics_ads.adSlotConfig[key].targeting['pv'] = gocomics_ads.adPageview;
      });
  };

  gocomics_ads.getPageview = function () {
      return gocomics_ads.adPageview;
  };

  // Set pageview
  gocomics_ads.adPageview = gocomics_ads.setPageviewCookie();


  // Set the ad slot path
  gocomics_ads.adSlotPath = '/19196947/gocomics.com/comic/cw';



  // Basic page information
  gocomics_ads.browserWidth = "CSS1Compat" == window.document.compatMode ? window.document.documentElement.clientWidth : window.document.body.clientWidth;
  gocomics_ads.browserHeight = "CSS1Compat" == window.document.compatMode ? window.document.documentElement.clientHeight : window.document.body.clientHeight;
  gocomics_ads.pageDomain = window.location.hostname;
  gocomics_ads.pagePath = window.location.pathname + location.search + location.hash;

      gocomics_ads.adSlots = adIds.concat(adPlaceholderIds);
      return gocomics_ads.adSlots;
  };*/


  gocomics_ads.findAds = function(className){
      var ads = $(document).find('.' + className);
      ads.removeClass(className);
      ads = Array.prototype.slice.call(ads);
      var visibleAds = ads.filter(gocomics_ads.isVisible);

      var adPlaceholders = $(document).find('.' + className + '-placeholder');
      adPlaceholders.removeClass(className+'-placeholder');
      adPlaceholders = Array.prototype.slice.call(adPlaceholders);

      var adPlaceholderIds = adPlaceholders.map(gocomics_ads.getPlaceholderInfo);
      var adIds = visibleAds.map(gocomics_ads.getElementInfo);

      gocomics_ads.adSlots = adIds.concat(adPlaceholderIds);
      return gocomics_ads.adSlots;
  };

  gocomics_ads.isVisible = function(element){
      return !!(element.offsetWidth || element.offsetHeight || element.getClientRects().length || element.getAttribute('data-visibility-exception') == 'true');
  };

  gocomics_ads.getElementId = function(element){
      return element.id;
  };

  gocomics_ads.getElementAdType = function(element) {
      return $(element).data('ad-type');
  };

  gocomics_ads.getPlaceholderId = function(element){
      return element.getAttribute('data-ad-id');
  };

  gocomics_ads.getElementInfo = function(element) {
      return {id: gocomics_ads.getElementId(element), adType: gocomics_ads.getElementAdType(element)};
  };

  gocomics_ads.getPlaceholderInfo = function(element) {
      return {id: gocomics_ads.getPlaceholderId(element), adType: gocomics_ads.getElementAdType(element)};
  };

  gocomics_ads.getSizeString = function(sizeArray) {
      return sizeArray[0] + "x" + sizeArray[1];
  };

  gocomics_ads.findBreakpoint = function(breakpointsArray) {
      var maxBpt, curBpt;
      for (var i = 0; i < breakpointsArray.length; i++) {
          curBpt = breakpointsArray[i];
          if (gocomics_ads.browserWidth >= curBpt.minWidth && gocomics_ads.browserHeight >= curBpt.minHeight){
              if(!maxBpt || (curBpt.minWidth >= maxBpt.minWidth && curBpt.minHeight >= maxBpt.minHeight)){
                  maxBpt = curBpt;
              }
          }
      }
      return maxBpt
  };
